abstract.t: Proxy Mobile IPv6 is the IETF standard for network-based localizedmobility management. In Proxy Mobile IPv6, mobile nodes aretopologically anchored at a Local Mobility Anchor, which forwards alldata for registered mobile nodes. The set up and maintenance oflocalized routing, which allows forwarding of data packets betweenmobile nodes and correspondent nodes directly without involvement ofthe Local Mobility Anchor in forwarding, is not considered. Thisdocument describes the problem space of localized routing in ProxyMobile IPv6.
